sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Grid,
  Text,
  Flex,
  Accordion,
  Center,
  Avatar,
  Badge,
  Checkbox,
  Button,
  ColorPicker,
  Input,
  Stack,
  Image,
  Card,
  Slider,
  ActionIcon,
} from "@mantine/core";
import {
  IconPlus,
  IconX,
  IconColumns1,
  IconBold,
  IconUnderline,
  IconItalic,
  IconLetterN,
} from "@tabler/icons-react";
import HomeSlider from "./HomeSlider";
import CategoryList from "./CategoryList";
import BrandList from "./BrandList";
import BrandWithProduct from "./BrandWithProduct";
const Layout = () => {
  return (
    <Box m="xs" bg="gray.2" style={{ borderRadius: "10px" }}>
      <Box
        bg="indigo.5"
        ml="xs"
        mr="xs"
        style={{
          display: "flex",
          alignItems: "center",
          justifyContent: "space-between",
          backgroundColor: "indigo.5",
          padding: "10px",
          borderRadius: "10px",
        }}
      >
        <Text
          fw={900}
          c={`#FFFFFF`}
          style={{
            flex: "1",
            textAlign: "center",
          }}
        >
          Layouts
        </Text>
        <IconX
          size={28}
          style={{
            borderRadius: "50%",
            background: "red",
            color: "white",
            alignSelf: "flex-end",
            cursor: "pointer",
          }}
        />
      </Box>

      <Accordion m="xs" pb={10} variant="contained">
      {/* Slider */}
        <HomeSlider />

        {/* Category List */}
        <CategoryList />
        {/* Category With Product */}
        {/* <Accordion.Item value="category-with-product">
          <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
            <Center>
              <Text fw={700}>Category With Product</Text>
            </Center>
          </Accordion.Control>
          <Accordion.Panel>
            <Box
              bg="gray.2"
              style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}
            >
              <Flex justify="space-between" align="center" direction="row">
                <Text ml="xs">{categoryWithProductHeaderValue}</Text>
                {showCheckbox && (
                  <Checkbox
                    checked={checkboxChecked}
                    onChange={(event) =>
                      setCheckboxChecked(event.target.checked)
                    }
                    mr="xs"
                  />
                )}
              </Flex>
              <Flex
                h={220}
                gap="2px"
                justify="flex-start"
                align="center"
                direction="row"
                wrap="wrap"
              >
                <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={90}>
                  <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                    On Sale
                  </Badge>
                  <Card.Section>
                    <Image
                      ml="xs"
                      mr="xs"
                      radius="md"
                      h={100}
                      w={70}
                      fit="contain"
                      src="https://johnlewis.scene7.com/is/image/JohnLewis/laptop-carousel1-010323"
                      alt="Norway"
                    />
                  </Card.Section>
                  <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                  <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                </Card>
                <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={90}>
                  <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                    On Sale
                  </Badge>
                  <Card.Section>
                    <Image
                      ml="xs"
                      mr="xs"
                      radius="md"
                      h={100}
                      w={70}
                      fit="contain"
                      src="https://sonysmart.com.bd/public/uploads/all/wmAR0iWAr5pRubmvbCtS0bXtrzqhpTCD2nUxSaDN.jpg"
                      alt="Norway"
                    />
                  </Card.Section>
                  <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                  <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                </Card>
                <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={90}>
                  <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                    On Sale
                  </Badge>
                  <Card.Section>
                    <Image
                      ml="xs"
                      mr="xs"
                      radius="md"
                      h={100}
                      w={70}
                      fit="contain"
                      src="https://images.macrumors.com/t/RnswrVxVO5LlEOaPBJfTaCue5iU=/1200x1200/smart/article-new/2023/02/airpods-pro-2-red-pink.jpg"
                      alt="Norway"
                    />
                  </Card.Section>
                  <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                  <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                </Card>
              </Flex>
            </Box>

            <Box
              bg="gray.2"
              mt="xs"
              onClick={handleCategoryWithProduct2Click}
              style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}
            >
              <Flex justify="space-between" align="center" direction="row">
                <Text ml="xs">{categoryWithProductHeaderValue}</Text>
                {showCheckbox2 && (
                  <Checkbox
                    checked={checkboxChecked2}
                    onChange={(event) =>
                      setCheckboxChecked2(event.target.checked)
                    }
                    mr="xs"
                  />
                )}
              </Flex>
              <Flex
                h={440}
                gap="2px"
                justify="flex-start"
                align="center"
                direction="row"
                wrap="wrap"
              >
                <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={145}>
                  <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                    On Sale
                  </Badge>
                  <Card.Section>
                    <Image
                      radius="md"
                      ml="xs"
                      h={100}
                      w="auto"
                      fit="contain"
                      src="https://johnlewis.scene7.com/is/image/JohnLewis/laptop-carousel1-010323"
                      alt="Norway"
                    />
                  </Card.Section>
                  <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                  <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                </Card>
                <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={145}>
                  <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                    On Sale
                  </Badge>
                  <Card.Section>
                    <Image
                      ml="xs"
                      mr="xs"
                      radius="md"
                      h={100}
                      w="auto"
                      fit="contain"
                      src="https://sonysmart.com.bd/public/uploads/all/wmAR0iWAr5pRubmvbCtS0bXtrzqhpTCD2nUxSaDN.jpg"
                      alt="Norway"
                    />
                  </Card.Section>
                  <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                  <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                </Card>
                <Card
                  ml="xs"
                  mt="xs"
                  shadow="sm"
                  padding="xs"
                  radius="md"
                  w={145}
                >
                  <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                    On Sale
                  </Badge>
                  <Card.Section>
                    <Image
                      ml="xs"
                      mr="xs"
                      radius="md"
                      h={100}
                      w="auto"
                      fit="contain"
                      src="https://images.macrumors.com/t/RnswrVxVO5LlEOaPBJfTaCue5iU=/1200x1200/smart/article-new/2023/02/airpods-pro-2-red-pink.jpg"
                      alt="Norway"
                    />
                  </Card.Section>
                  <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                  <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                </Card>
                <Card
                  ml="xs"
                  mt="xs"
                  shadow="sm"
                  padding="xs"
                  radius="md"
                  w={145}
                >
                  <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                    On Sale
                  </Badge>
                  <Card.Section>
                    <Image
                      ml="xs"
                      mr="xs"
                      radius="md"
                      h={100}
                      w="auto"
                      fit="contain"
                      src="https://images.macrumors.com/t/RnswrVxVO5LlEOaPBJfTaCue5iU=/1200x1200/smart/article-new/2023/02/airpods-pro-2-red-pink.jpg"
                      alt="Norway"
                    />
                  </Card.Section>
                  <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                  <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                </Card>
              </Flex>
            </Box>
          </Accordion.Panel>
        </Accordion.Item> */}
        {/* Brand List */}
        <BrandList />
        {/* Brand With Product */}
        <BrandWithProduct />
        {/* Latest Product/ Recently Added */}
        
        {/* Most Populer Product */}
        <Accordion.Item value="most-populer-product">
          <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
            <Center>
              <Text fw={700}>Most Populer Product</Text>
            </Center>
          </Accordion.Control>
          <Accordion.Panel>Content</Accordion.Panel>
        </Accordion.Item>
      </Accordion>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Layout;
